Features

Keyword Strategy Builder

Keyword Strategy Builder

Plan and construct a complete SEO content strategy for your website. Analyze up to 10,000 keywords simultaneously for an in-depth understanding of your opportunities.

Build Keyword Strategy
Visualize Your SEO Strategy
Use the Keyword Strategy Builder to map out topics for pillar and subpages from seed keywords and refresh metrics to track changes in SERP features and keyword data.
Set Your SEO Roadmap

Enter up to five seed keywords, and the tool will generate a structured roadmap of topics and pages.

Try It Free
Get a Bird’s Eye View of Your Keyword Strategy

Review a keyword strategy from your seed keyword. Use the Topical Overview to review their relationships.

Try It Free
Review Clustered Lists for Targeted Strategy

Manage your tailored keyword lists with clustering by intent, prioritized based on volume and difficulty.

Try It Free
Comprehensive Metrics in Table View

Access key metrics like intent, volume, CPC, and keyword difficulty in a concise table format.

Try It Free
Refresh Data On Demand

Monitor SERP features and competitor rankings for your keywords. Refresh data to track changes in metrics.

Try It Free
Integrate Your Keyword Strategy Across Semrush Tools
Send keywords to other Semrush tools like the SEO Writing Assistant or Position Tracking to unify your SEO strategy. Or, export your data in an XLS or CSV format for further analysis.
Try It Free
Contact us
